TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Docs.summary: Interacts with the parser to build the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void AppendLiteralString(string s) cil managed

Docs.param: The literal content to add to the control.
Docs.summary: Adds literal content to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder.AppendLiteralString%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AppendLiteralString%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class so that the method of the base class has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public override Type GetChildControlType (string tagName, System.Collections.IDictionary attribs);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Type GetChildControlType(string tagName, class System.Collections.IDictionary attribs) cil managed

Docs.param: The tag name of the child control.
An array of attributes contained in the child control.
Docs.summary: Obtains the for the control's specified child control.
Docs.returns: The method is overridden to always return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class. This implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method always returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool NeedsTagInnerText() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the control needs to get its inner text.
Docs.returns: The method is overridden to always return .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class to always return `true`.
The inner text is the text between the opening and closing tags of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetTagInnerText(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: The value to insert as the inner text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method loads the <xref:System.String> passed in to an XML document to determine whether it is well-formed. If it is, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class.

Docs.exception: The object passed in is not well-formed XML.
